data: `minecraft:behavior.random_sitting` allows an entity to stop and sit for a random duration of time.

data.Name: cooldown_time
data.Description: Time in seconds the mob has to wait before using the goal again

data.Name: min_sit_time
data.Description: The minimum amount of time in seconds before the mob can stand back up

data.Name: start_chance
data.Description: This is the chance that the mob will start this goal, from 0 to 1

data.Name: stop_chance
data.Description: This is the chance that the mob will stop this goal, from 0 to 1
